sources.title: Emerald Run | Full Movie 2022 | Action Adventure | David Chokachi

metadata.Plot: A desperate man gets involved in a risky plan to smuggle emeralds across the Mexican border in order to save his daughter's life. When the deal goes awry and he is left for dead, his survival becomes a search for meaning and enlightenment in a brutally harsh desert landscape.
metadata.Actors: Michael Paré, Vernon Wells, John Schneider
